name: Dodge (itch) (SilverSpace) (SilverSpace)
description:
Dodge

A am learning more about becoming an actual game dev. And so I am going to make 5 small-scale games, this is the third one.

This is a game about dodging red enemies that are trying to hunt you down.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Joystick - Move

Space/C/A on xbox controller - Dash
